subject: Re: [junit] Testing a void method....
msgSnippet: I rely upon Acceptance tests to test this kind of 3rd party integration issues. I find it make my unit tests smaller, easier to write, faster to run, adding a
messageBody:
I rely upon Acceptance tests to test this kind of 3rd party integration
issues. I find it make my unit tests smaller, easier to write, faster to
run, adding a layer of indirection between the application code and its
dependencies, etc.

YMMV
